definitions.definition: The group of people who do not belong to one's own social group.
In cladistics , all the taxa included in a study that do not belong to the ingroup that is of immediate interest.

main_definition: ( sociology ) The group of people who do not belong to one's own social group.
secondary_definitions: ( systematics ) In cladistics , all the taxa included in a study that do not belong to the ingroup that is of immediate interest.
